A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney is killing Star Wars. I was so excited for this movie to come out. Don't waste your time if you are a fan of the series. The forth awakens was not the best but it was pretty good. Rouge one was awesome! this movie was literally pointless. It answered nothing that we were wondering about the characters especially Snoke. I just am so disappointed with this movie. Disney better wake up and realize that they have to course correct fast or the fan base that makes star wars what it is will slowly drift away.
